content: As a Tennessee Grad/Fan, let me just say there was nothing “deceptive” about the quality of the SEC this year. It was pretty damn bad. That being said Alabama is just a different animal. Not only are they good, in a league marred by inconsistency, Alabama is remarkably steady. They basically can platoon sub at any skill position, and their line play (Offense and Defense) is probably the best in the country.
